p: Among the tested extracts, methanolic extracts of T. paradoxa showed high amount of phenolics 351.43 ± 14.5 mg GAE/g, tannin 34.38 ± 1.02 mg GAE/g, flavonoids 1384.44 ± 50.92 mg QE/g, triterpenoids 130.5 ± 2.77 mg/g and acetone extracts of T. paradoxa displayed maximum amount of sterols 3.2 ± 0.2 mg/g ( Table 1). The total phenolics, tannin, flavonoids and triterpenoids contents of T. paradoxa extracts were as follows methanol > chloroform > acetone > petroleum ether. The extractable sterols of T. paradoxa were as follows acetone > methanol > petroleum ether > chloroform ( Table 1).
